Document.Title: Visual Studio 2003 PROBLEM: New Windows Script Host Item Produces Active Schema Errors; The active schema does not support the element 'package' or 'job'

Content:
By default, a new WSF file added as WinScript1.wsf looks like this:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<package xmlns="Windows Script Host">
    <job>
        <script language="VBscript">

        </script>
    </job>
</package>

This file will generate schema errors against wshmeta.xsd in the Common7\Packages\schemas\xml directory of your Visual Studio installation. To deal with this problem immediately, change the file to this:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<package xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WindowsScriptHost">
    <job>
        <script language="VBscript">
        
        </script>
    </job>
</package>
